summary: this is the first part of the dark days series that is now uploaded to nexus
descriptionHtml:
Imperials and Sombrage, then the return of Alduine, the return of Vampires, the return of Miracle, but you have not see the Dark One .... 
He is the most powerfull warlord of the world that has bin known. 
He will come back, not alone, bringing with him his new army of Dark Soldiers and other powerfull monsters 
.... There is a tower under construction, but why? ....There are ravens everywhere, but why?... The days to come will be darkers and darkers.... So, are you reddy? 


Are you capable to be part of this bloody war opposing all nations of SKYRIM!!! 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description: 

This mod will add you an mysterious crystal tower , a conspiracy against Skyrim, 
a new spell, a dark soldier, ravens in Whiterun, and who knows, .... more in the chapter number 2 ... 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Quest: 

This mission does not have an arrow to guide you on the card, so you have to make your own little investigation. 
The small letters that you will find in Whiterun does not adressed to you, but to the assassin who must kill the Jarl so, do not kill him!

if an enemy kills a person just do resurrect in  the console command
author: sam
